overview: In a room with faux marble walls and wall-size Roman-style paintings, on a red leather banquette along the side, Gino Francesco (blue cloak, gold headband) sits and sucks Austin Rodgers (naked, slim, muscular, heavy necklace with medallions); Xavier Demarco (red cloak) enters but stops in a corner and starts jacking; Austin sucks Gino.
title: The Gladiators 4
